timeline.bodyText: Thanks @aryangupta1998 . Why do the no of datanodes matter here? can you explain?
timeline.author: bshashikant

replies.bodyText: Thanks @bshashikant. Thanks for pointing out and sorry for the mistake. I have removed this javadoc.
replies.author: aryangupta1998

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/hadoop-ozone/integration-test/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/freon/TestHadoopNestedDirGenerator.java b/hadoop-ozone/integration-test/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/freon/TestHadoopNestedDirGenerator.java
index 1d02ca866..69731ea66 100644
--- a/hadoop-ozone/integration-test/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/freon/TestHadoopNestedDirGenerator.java
+++ b/hadoop-ozone/integration-test/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/freon/TestHadoopNestedDirGenerator.java

@@ -79,11 +79,6 @@ private void shutdown() throws IOException {
      * @throws IOException
      */
 
-    /**
-     * Below we have 5 datanodes because only 5 tests are activated
-     * As you need more tests increase the datanodes accordingly.
-     */
-
   private void startCluster() throws Exception {
     conf = new OzoneConfiguration();
     cluster = MiniOzoneCluster.newBuilder(conf).setNumDatanodes(5).build();
